short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let me show you the values

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reading an apex code ? 

Need to know the values of Custom Labels referenced in it?

You can now instantly read the custom label values without leaving your current apex page. while you are reading the code this extension will fetch custom label values for you. Right information is just ONE CLICK AWAY.

This displays below information of a custom label - 
1. Full Name
2.Short Description
3.Protected?
4.Language
5.Values
